message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this great product at a special starting price of $10,000. I know you'll find it valuable.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe we can come to an agreement closer to my valuation. How about we aim for $8,000 for the product?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is a fair starting point considering the value this product brings. Could you meet me halfway at $9,000?
Hello Alice, I understand your position, but I still believe that $8,000 would be a fair price for the product. Would you consider meeting us at this price?
